title: Minneapolis - Top floor, Balcony overlooking Downtown 9/1
posting_body: ['Available 9/1/22', 'Unit and Property:', 'This unit is a spacious one-bedroom apartment in a clean, quiet and newly renovated building.', 'This property features private balconies or patios, ceramic tile kitchen and bath floors, with laminate hardwood in the living room and bedroom.', '1501 Portland Ave also includes an on-site workout facility and high-efficiency laundry on every floor.', 'Location is just south of downtown, walking distance to many restaurants, coffee shops, bars, and music venues.', 'Convenient access to the Minneapolis skyway, U.S. Bank Stadium, both the green and blue line light rail, and all that downtown has to offer.', 'To learn more about us, schedule a showing, or apply, visit: <URL>', 'Included Amenities:', 'Wifi', 'Electric vehicle charging station', 'Bike storage and workspace', 'On-site laundry', 'Locally made soaps (laundry, personal soaps, tub and tile)', 'Gym', 'Metal, textile, lighting, electronics, plastic bag, styrofoam recycling', 'On counter composter and compost bags', 'Eco-friendly toilet paper, LED light bulbs, and compostable dog waste bags', 'Utilities paid by tenant:', 'Electricity', 'Utilities paid by owner:', 'Trash & compost, gas, water, internet', 'Off-street lot parking spaces and large storage units are available on a first-come, first-serve basis for an additional monthly fee.', 'This property is pet-friendly, both cats and dogs are allowed with management approval, pet deposit, and pet rent.', 'Garden spaces are available for reservation for a small fee.', 'Green Rock Apartments:', 'Green Rock Apartments is a small property management firm focused on eco-conscious urban living.', 'We have been in operation since 1991.', 'Our mission is to provide safe, comfortable, and eco-friendly living spaces that foster healthy, sustainable communities.', 'To learn more about us, view availability, or schedule a showing visit: <URL>/']
